body: This area is subdivided into smaller chambers and provides private housing and limited storage for up to 10 people. Each chamber typically includes one or two small beds, linens, a chamber pot, and a small table and chair. The door to the chamber is a simple wooden door with a simple lock. You may upgrade individual locks by paying the price difference between a simple lock and the desired lock.
name: Lodging
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Rooms And Teams/Rooms and Teams/Rooms/Lodging
